comment._content:
This photograph comes from the "Sydney Harbour Bridge Photographic Albums" (State Records series no.    12685 ) which came to State Records from the Bradfield family in 1968.

Bradfield appears in many of the photos from that album in front of construction he had initiated or designed.  

He had much of which to be proud.

comment._content: This photograph also appears on facing page 110 of the book Heart of The Rocks of Old Sydney by Isadore Brodsky (1965, Old Sydney Free Press, Neutral Bay) There it bears the caption: "A big man and a big bridge. The picture was taken four days before the official opening of the bridge on March 19 1932. Dr Bradfield emerges as a significant figure."
